ol.li: SHALL conform to PHCR Public Health Case Report template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.15)

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] component, such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] influenza Immunization Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.15.2.47)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component, such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] influenza PHCR Clinical Information Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.15.2.50)

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] component, such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] influenza PHCR Treatment Information Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.15.2.48)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title = "Public Health Case Report - Influenza"

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] component, such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] influenza PHCR Relevant Diagnostic Tests And Or Laboratory Data Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.15.2.51)

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] component, such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] influenza PHCR Social History Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.15.2.49)
SHALL conform to PHCR Public Health Case Report template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.15)
Contains exactly one [1..1] typeId, where its data type is InfrastructureRootTypeId
Contains exactly one [1..1] id, where its data type is II
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="55751-2" Public Health Case Report (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:546)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title = "Public Health Case Report - Influenza"
Contains exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime, where its data type is TS
Contains exactly one [1..1] confidentialityCode, where its data type is CE
Contains at least one [1..*] recordTarget, where its type is Record Target
Contains at least one [1..*] author, where its type is Author
Contains exactly one [1..1] custodian, where its type is Custodian
Contains exactly one [1..1] component, where its type is Component2

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] component (CONF:643, CONF:609), such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] Phcr Encounters Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.15.2.2)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component, such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] CCD Immunizations Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.6)

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] component, such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] influenza Immunization Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.15.2.47)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component, such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] influenza PHCR Clinical Information Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.15.2.50)

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] component, such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] influenza PHCR Treatment Information Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.15.2.48)

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] component, such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] influenza PHCR Relevant Diagnostic Tests And Or Laboratory Data Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.15.2.51)

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] component, such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] influenza PHCR Social History Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.15.2.49)

SHALL contain [1..1] recordTarget (CONF:547)
[OCL]: self.recordTarget->one(recordTarget : cda::RecordTarget | not recordTarget.oclIsUndefined())

RecordTarget SHALL contain [1..1] patientRole (CONF:548)
[OCL]: self.recordTarget.patientRole->one(patientRole : cda::PatientRole | not patientRole.oclIsUndefined())

RecordTarget / PatientRole SHALL contain [1..*] id (CONF:549)
[OCL]: self.recordTarget.patientRole.id->exists(id : datatypes::II | not id.root.oclIsUndefined() or not id.extension.oclIsUndefined() or not id.nullFlavor.oclIsUndefined())
RecordTarget / PatientRole SHOULD contain [0..*] addr (CONF:550)
RecordTarget / PatientRole SHOULD contain [0..*] telecom (CONF:551)
RecordTarget / PatientRole SHOULD contain [0..1] patient (CONF:552)
RecordTarget / PatientRole / Patient SHOULD contain [0..*] name (CONF:553)

RecordTarget / PatientRole / Patient SHOULD contain [0..1] administrativeGenderCode/@code, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.1 Administrative Gender (HL7 V3) DYNAMIC (CONF:554)
RecordTarget / PatientRole / Patient SHOULD contain [0..1] birthTime (CONF:555)
RecordTarget / PatientRole / Patient SHOULD contain [0..1] ethnicGroupCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet 2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.837 Ethnicity group DYNAMIC (CONF:556)
RecordTarget / PatientRole / Patient SHOULD contain [0..1] birthplace/place, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet 2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.3200 Birth Country DYNAMIC (CONF:557)

SHALL contain [1..*] author (CONF:1853)
[OCL]: self.author->exists(author : cda::Author | not author.oclIsUndefined())

Author SHALL contain [1..1] time (CONF:560)
[OCL]: self.author.time->one(time : datatypes::TS | not time.value.oclIsUndefined() or not time.nullFlavor.oclIsUndefined())

Author SHALL contain [1..1] assignedAuthor (CONF:561)
[OCL]: self.author.assignedAuthor->one(assignedAuthor : cda::AssignedAuthor | not assignedAuthor.oclIsUndefined())

Author / AssignedAuthor SHALL contain [1..*] id (CONF:562)
[OCL]: self.author.assignedAuthor.id->exists(id : datatypes::II | not id.root.oclIsUndefined() or not id.extension.oclIsUndefined() or not id.nullFlavor.oclIsUndefined())

Author / AssignedAuthor SHALL contain [1..1] addr (CONF:562)
[OCL]: self.author.assignedAuthor.addr->one(addr : datatypes::AD | not addr.oclIsUndefined())

Author / AssignedAuthor SHALL contain [1..1] telecom (CONF:564)
[OCL]: self.author.assignedAuthor.telecom->one(tel : datatypes::TEL | not tel.oclIsUndefined())

Author / AssignedAuthor SHALL contain [1..1] assignedPerson/name (CONF:565)
[OCL]: self.author.assignedAuthor.assignedPerson->one(assignedPerson : cda::Person | not assignedPerson.oclIsUndefined()) and self.author.assignedAuthor.assignedPerson.name->one(name : datatypes::PN | not name.oclIsUndefined())
The custodian of a public health case report SHALL be the reporting organization. (CONF:1616)

SHALL contain [1..1] legalAuthenticator (CONF:1854)
[OCL]: self.legalAuthenticator->one(legalAuthenticator : cda::LegalAuthenticator | not legalAuthenticator.oclIsUndefined())

LegalAuthenticator SHALL contain [1..1] time (CONF:1855)
[OCL]: self.legalAuthenticator.time->one(time : datatypes::TS | not time.value.oclIsUndefined() or not time.nullFlavor.oclIsUndefined())

LegalAuthenticator SHALL contain [1..1] assignedEntity (CONF:1856)
[OCL]: self.legalAuthenticator.assignedEntity->one(assignedEntity : cda::AssignedEntity | not assignedEntity.oclIsUndefined())

LegalAuthenticator / AssignedEntity SHALL contain [1..*] id (CONF:1857)
[OCL]: self.legalAuthenticator.assignedEntity.id->exists(id : datatypes::II | not id.root.oclIsUndefined() or not id.extension.oclIsUndefined() or not id.nullFlavor.oclIsUndefined())

LegalAuthenticator / AssignedEntity SHALL contain [1..1] addr (CONF:1857)
[OCL]: self.legalAuthenticator.assignedEntity.addr->one(addr : datatypes::AD | not addr.oclIsUndefined())
LegalAuthenticator / AssignedEntity SHALL contain [1..1] telecom (CONF:1859)

LegalAuthenticator / AssignedEntity SHALL contain [1..1] assignedPerson/name (CONF:1860)
[OCL]: self.legalAuthenticator.assignedEntity.assignedPerson->one(assignedPerson : cda::Person | not assignedPerson.oclIsUndefined()) and self.legalAuthenticator.assignedEntity.assignedPerson.name->one(name : datatypes::PN | not name.oclIsUndefined())

Where a Public Health Case Report CDA R2 document contains any of the section or clinical statement templates defined in this implementation guide, such section or clinical statement SHALL include a templateId/@root valued with the corresponding template's identifier. (CONF:2017)
